doc.title: Divining the Human: The Cathedral Tapestries of John Nava
doc.plot: Explore the innovative creation of tapestries for the newly constructed Cathedral of Our Lady of the Angels, in downtown Los Angeles. To render these massive tapestries, artist John Nava integrated twenty-first century technology with centuries-old artistic tradition. He created a beautiful work of art that enhances the cathedral's themes of spiritual unity and ethnic diversity. "Divining the Human" is an acclaimed, award-winning documentary that provides visually stunning insight into a singular artistic achievement.
